thread.title: Man, 48, critically wounded in Little Village shooting

title: Man, 48, critically wounded in Little Village shooting
text:
A 48-year-old man was critically wounded in a Little Village shooting early Saturday.
At 3:57 a.m., the man stopped at a stop sign in the 2400 block of South St. Louis Avenue when someone shot him from the sidewalk, police said.
The man suffered gunshot wounds to the chest and abdomen, and he was taken to Mount Sinai Hospital in critical condition, police said.
